name: Generally, Daemonic names can be generated with Sacred Numbers worth of Syllables, +1d5 for Herald Daemons, +1d10 on top of that for Daemon Princes or Greater Daemons. Roll 2 1d10 rolls to determine one syllable then reorder to make something vaguely comprehensible. Or just make it up.

system.novice:
- The Enactor Knows Little of what they are trying to do
- The veil between Reality and the Warp is strong
- The Ritual is conducted on Hallowed Ground, or antagonistic individuals of faith are present (Sisters of Battle, Ecclesiarchy Priests, Grey Knights, Chaplains, etc)
